creator: spalan13@travelers.com
text: When we record the test cases we were not able to encrypt the password .Password is visible in this case(Apache Jmeter 3.0 r1743807)

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
I suppose this is an enhancement request to request for confidential informations to be encrypted by JMeter.
If so this is out of scope of the project unless you are ready to provide a PR for it.


Thanks for report.
